title: LISTEN: Ariana Grande Duets With Opera Singer Andrea Bocelli
content:
00:18 GMT 
 
Sing it, sister!
                      Ariana Grande, who has already proven to us that she can do a Celine Dion impression better than anyone else, shows off her singing chops again in her new duet with world-renowned opera tenor Andrea Bocelli. The collaboration, which was first announced in August, has the two singers recording a version of the song “E più ti penso.”
                      Their duet uses music from the  …
